channel.title: Network on Jimmy's Code
channel.description: Recent content in Network on Jimmy's Code

item.title: 徹底搞懂網路
item.description: OSI七層協議 Layer 7 - Application - HTTP/FTP/gRPC Layer 6 - Presentation - Encoding, Serialization Layer 5 - Session - Connection establishment, TLS Layer 4 - Transport - UDP/TCP Layer 3 - Network - IP > Datagram Layer 2 - Data link - Frames, Mac address Ethernet Layer 1 - Physical - Electric signals, fiber or radio waves ARP 操作在第二層
